content: उद्गॄ {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To eject, spit out, vomit; उद्गिरतो यद्गरलं फणिनः पुष्णासि परिमलोद्गारैः <ls>Bv. 1. 11</ls>; उद्गिरन्निव स्नेहं <ls>Śi. 14. 1.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) To emit, send or put forth, pour down or out, discharge, belch out; सहांभसैवापदमुद्गिरंति <ls>Pt. 5. 67</ls>; निक्षेपणात् रागमिवोद्गिरंतौ <ls>Ku. 1. 33.</ls> ({%b%}) To send out of the mouth, speak, utter (as words); महीपतेः शासनमुज्जगार <ls>R. 14. 53</ls>; <ls>Ve. 5. 14</ls>; यदुद्गिरति भ्रमरः <ls>Mu. 2. 11</ls> (where it also means ‘vomits’ or ‘emits’). {@--3@} To breathe out. {@--4@} To rise from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to pour forth, raise (as sound).
